mapper.select: SELECT A.user_id AS userId , A.point , B.order_id AS orderId , B.reservation_status AS reservationStatus , C.created_at AS paymentDate , C.ticket_id AS ticketId , C.ticket_status AS ticketStatus , D.menu_id AS menuId , D.menu_count AS menuCount , D.price , E.menu_name AS menuName FROM user_payment_member A LEFT JOIN `order` B ON A.order_id = B.order_id LEFT JOIN ticket C ON A.order_id = C.order_id LEFT JOIN order_detail D ON B.order_id = D.order_id LEFT JOIN restaurant_menu E ON D.menu_id = E.menu_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY A.user_id order BY C.created_at DESC
